testCases.label: Checks initial balance is zero
testCases.description: Verifies that a new BankService starts with a balance of 0.

testCases.label: Checks deposits update balance
testCases.description: Verifies that depositing 500 results in a balance of 500.

testCases.label: Checks multiple deposits accumulate
testCases.description: Verifies that depositing 500 then 200 yields a balance of 700.

testCases.label: Checks withdrawal subtracts from balance
testCases.description: Verifies that depositing 500 then withdrawing 200 results in a balance of 300.

testCases.label: Checks existence of overdraft protection
testCases.description: Verifies that withdrawing beyond the available balance leaves the balance unchanged at 500.

testCases.label: Zeroes balance after full withdrawal
testCases.description: Verifies that depositing 500 then withdrawing 500 results in a balance of 0.
